mapper.select: SELECT A.RN, A.BOARD_NO, A.WRITER, A.TITLE, A.CONTENT, A.HIT, A.IP, A.CREATED, A.MODIFIED FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY CREATED DESC) AS RN, BOARD_NO, WRITER, TITLE, CONTENT, HIT, IP, CREATED, MODIFIED FROM BOARD) A WHERE A.RN BETWEEN #{beginRecord} AND #{endRecord}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD (BOARD_NO, WRITER, TITLE, CONTENT, HIT, IP, CREATED, MODIFIED) VALUES (BOARD_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{writer}, #{title}, #{content}, 0, #{ip}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE)
